document.webtitle: Yahoo! Canada Answers - What if you were turned into a store mannequin for three days?
document.description: What if you were turned into a store ... you're afraid you'll never get out of? What do you think of this song? What is your favorite fast food restaurant?

how would you be posed? where would you be displayed? what would you be wearing? what would happen when you revert normal? 8 months ago Report Abuse by Jos h2o Member since: August 05, 2009 Total points: 22,545 (Level 6) Add Contact Block
